description: The station supports all forms of coach activities including scheduled express and commuter services, day tours, coach holidays and private hire.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["The station supports all forms of coach activities including scheduled express and commuter services, day tours, coach holidays and private hire."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
If you are a coach operator and you would like to make a booking, or to discuss your particular needs, please phone 0845 604 0770 ( TfL call charges )

{"template":"table","rows":[["h3","h3","h3"],["Departure charges: Off-peak","£46.27","£55.52"],["Departure charges: Peak","£68.02","£81.62"],["","",""],["h3","h3","h3"],["Departure charges: Off-peak","£53.27","£63.92"],["Departure charges: Peak","£75.02","£90.02"]]}
Working in partnership with Sammy's Garage, Victoria Coach Station can offer the following facilities to coach operators:
Sammy's Garage is open 364 days a year from 06:00 to 23:00, and is located inside the Arrivals Terminal on Eccleston Place.
For further information, please call Sammy's Garage on 020 7730 8867.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Monitored by CCTV and patrolled by staff 24 hours a day","Fuelling, toilet drop and maintenance in association with Sammy's Garage","Ticket sale facilities for advance and on-the-day purchases","Ground staff to assist with check-in and boarding","Approved routes for journeys to and from the coach station (please see maps below)"]}
